text: For decades, Betsey Johnson’s core business was making hot-pink prom dresses with black lace-up corsets and neon trim, selling well-mannered teens a dream of rebellion. After the 2008 crash, the Johnson brand found itself $48.8 million in debt. https://t.co/K017nIlV0c
